page.shortlink: ux control radiobutton properties button style
page.description: Defines the placement of an image relative to text for a radiobutton control rendered as a button list.

description.p: When a radiobutton control is rendered as a button list, each button in the button list can be displayed with an image. The *[ui:Button style]* property defines how the image and text for a button in the button list are rendred. The following options are available for use:

item.name: Image followed by text
item.description: Button text is displayed after an image.

item.name: Text followed by image
item.description: Image is displayed after the button text.

item.name: Text left & image right
item.description: Image is right justified and text is left justified.

item.name: Image left & text right
item.description: Image is left justified and text is right justified.
